events.message: The applicant has completed and submitted the loan application for personal expenses related to upcoming medical bills.
The loan application has been categorised under Personal Loan based on purpose keywords such as medical and personal.
Loan officer Jane Thompson has been assigned to handle the applicant's request for a personal loan to cover medical expenses.
Initial review of the application indicates that the requested loan amount matches the submitted medical bills documentation.
Additional documents requested from applicant include detailed medical invoices and proof of income for verification purposes.
Applicant has submitted all requested medical invoices and recent pay stubs for thorough assessment of their personal loan application.
Credit bureau report has been received and reviewed; applicant's credit score is within acceptable range for a personal loan.
Completed thorough risk analysis of the applicant's financial situation, factoring in debt levels and repayment capacity.
Loan offer outlining amount, interest rate, and repayment terms has been presented to the applicant for consideration.
Applicant responded affirmatively to the loan offer and asked for minor clarifications regarding the repayment schedule.
Application was escalated to the senior review committee due to the applicantâ€™s request for a slightly extended repayment period.
Senior committee approved the personal loan with an amended repayment schedule to accommodate applicant's financial situation.
Loan funds have been disbursed to the applicant's designated bank account to cover the medical expenses as requested.
Follow-up with applicant confirmed that the funds were received and are being appropriately used for medical treatment.
The personal loan application process has been officially closed after successful funding and positive applicant feedback.
